Package Vue

Using the concept "VMP", this packages containes the views of the project.
  • VueTexte is the commande line view.
  • mainFrame is the main window of the graphic view, but it is generated by gameConfigDialog, who is also generated, by welcomeFrame. And the mainFrame will generate the endDialog.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Observer
    The class Observer is a class of the design pattern Observer.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    checkButton
    The class checkButton is a class of Thread for creating a JButton which is responsible for showing the Jest for users in the course of the game.
    checkJestDialog
    The class checkJestDialog is responsible for the window which is created when checkButton is clicked.
    endDialog
    The class endDialog is a class of Thread for creating a window to show the result of the game.
    gameConfigDialog
    The class gameConfigDialog is a class who will be created by a instance of welcomeFrame.
    mainFrame
    The class mainFrame is a class who create the main window of the game.It implements the interface Observer in order to update its contents once the game has changed.
    mainFrameOrig  
    VuePlayer
    The class VuePlayer is a class who will set all elements of a player in the windows.
    VueTexte
    The class VueTexte is a class which will create a new thread in order to monitor the commande line.
    welcomeFrame
    The class welcomeFrame is a class which will create a window at the beginning of the game.
